text: analohiya tse svitovo zhyttya vyhlyadaye yak tse: my posylayemo vnyz vodu z neba vyrobyty z tse vsi riznovydy zavodiv z zemli, ta shchob zabezpechyty prodovolʹstvo dlya lyudey ta tvaryn. Todi, tilʹky yak zemlya doskonalo prykrashayetʹsya, ta yoho lyudy dumayutʹ shcho vony ye u kontroli tut, nash vyrok prybuvaye nichchyu abo dnem, lyshayuchy tse povnistyu bezplidne, tak, yakby nichoho ne isnuvav naperedodni. My takym chynom roz'yasnyuyemo apokalipsys dlya lyudey shcho viddzerkalyuyutʹ
